bibl.title: Preface.
bibl.note: The Center of Papyrological Studies (Ain-Shams University, Abbassia-Cairo) intends to issue an annual bulletin including edition and studies of subjects affiliated to Pharaonic, Hebrew, Aramaic, Greek, Latin and Arabic papyri.
bibl.seg: El Mosallamy Abdalla Hassan S., Preface.

The Center of Papyrological Studies (Ain-Shams University, Abbassia-Cairo) intends to issue an annual bulletin including edition and studies of subjects affiliated to Pharaonic, Hebrew, Aramaic, Greek, Latin and Arabic papyri.
